a.title: Diomede Basketball Team Participates in Cultural Activities Leading Up to Tournament

div.a: Diomede Basketball Team Participates in Cultural Activities Leading Up to Tournament
div.div: As part of Diomede students' trip to Koyuk for a middle school basketball tournament, they extended their stay in order to participate in a few local cultural activities.

img.alt: Shaktoolik School students hold up posters for their musher
img.title: Shaktoolik School students hold up posters for their musher

div.div: Elementary students from Paul F. Asicksik Sr. School in Shaktoolik, followed the Iditarod. There were just enough mushers and students this year that every elementary student from K-6 was able to draw a musher and follow them on the trail.
div.a: Read More about Shaktoolik students track the Iditarod
